column4: I have googled all over the place and I cannot find anywhere how to access the Device Manager, everything says go to System > Administration and should be there, but it's not. Please help?
Soundray: I need to access device manager so that i can see if my SD card reader shows up there. I have been trying to get it working for days now.
lspci will tell you whether the reader (as opposed to the card itself) is detected
